document.title: Vinogradov’s estimate for exponential sums over primes

para.p:
For
∈ x R
, let
[ x ]
be the greatest integer
≤
x
, let
=
⁢ R
( x )
- x
[ x ]
, and let

Math.text: norm@(x) = minimum@(R * x, 1 - R * x) = (minimum _ (m element-of Z))@(absolute-value@(x - m))

para.p: In this note I work through Chapters 24 and 25 of Harold Davenport, Multiplicative Number Theory, third ed. 1 footnote 1 1 footnote 1 Many of the manipulations of sums in these chapters are hard to follow, and I greatly expand on the calculations in Davenport. The organization of the proof in Davenport seems to be due to Vaughan. I have also used lecture notes by Andreas Strömbergsson, http://www2.math.uu.se/~astrombe/analtalt08/www_notes.pdf, pp. 245–257. Another set of notes, which I have not used, are http://jonismathnotes.blogspot.ca/2014/11/prime-exponential-sums-and-vaughans.html

We end up proving that there is some constant
C
such that if
∈ α R
and
≤
|
- α
a q
|
1
q 2
, with
a
positive and
=
gcd
( a , q )
1
, then for any
≥ N 2
,

Let
Λ
be the von Mangoldt function:
=
⁢ Λ
( n )
log p
if
= n
p α
for some prime
p
and
≥ α 1
, and
=
⁢ Λ
( n )
0
otherwise. For example,
=
⁢ Λ
( 4 )
log 2
,
=
⁢ Λ
( 11 )
log 11
, and
=
⁢ Λ
( 12 )
0
. This satisfies

Math.text: logarithm@(n) = (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@(Lambda * d)

para.p: and so by the Möbius inversion formula,

Math.text: Lambda * n = (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@(mu * (n / d) * logarithm@(d))

para.p:
For
> n 1
it is a fact that 2 footnote 2 2 footnote 2 G. H. Hardy and E. M. Wright, An Introduction to the Theory of Numbers, fifth ed., p. 235, Theorem 263.

Math.text: (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@(mu * d) = 0

para.p:
Write
=
⁢ ψ
( x )
∑
≤ n x
⁢ Λ
( n )
. It is a fact that
=
⁢ ψ
( x )
⁢ O
( x )
. 3 footnote 3 3 footnote 3 G. H. Hardy and E. M. Wright, An Introduction to the Theory of Numbers, fifth ed., p. 341, Theorem 414. (The prime number theorem states
∼
⁢ ψ
( x )
x
.)
The derivative of the Riemann zeta function is

Math.text: formulae@(zeta ^ prime * s = - ((sum _ (n = 1)) ^ infinity)@(n ^ (- s) * logarithm@(n)), Re * s > 1)

para.p: The Euler product for the Riemann zeta function is

Math.text: formulae@(zeta * s = ((sum _ (m = 1)) ^ infinity)@(m ^ (- s)) = (product _ p)@((1 - p ^ (- s)) ^ (- 1)), Re * s > 1)
- logarithm@(zeta) * s = (sum _ p)@(logarithm@(1 - p ^ (- s)))
- (zeta ^ prime * s) / (zeta * s) = (sum _ p)@((p ^ (- s) * logarithm@(p)) / (1 - p ^ (- s)))
- (zeta ^ prime * s) / (zeta * s)
absent = (sum _ p)@((p ^ (- s) * logarithm@(p)) / (1 - p ^ (- s)))
absent = (sum _ p)@(logarithm@(p) * ((sum _ (l = 1)) ^ infinity)@(p ^ (- l * s)))
absent = (sum _ p)@(logarithm@(p) * ((sum _ (l = 1)) ^ infinity)@(p ^ (- l * s)))
absent = (sum _ p)@(((sum _ (l = 1)) ^ infinity)@(Lambda * p ^ l * p ^ l ^ (- s)))
absent = (sum _ p)@(((sum _ (l = 1)) ^ infinity)@(Lambda * p ^ l * p ^ l ^ (- s)))
absent = ((sum _ (n = 1)) ^ infinity)@(Lambda * n * n ^ (- s))
absent = ((sum _ (n = 1)) ^ infinity)@(Lambda * n * n ^ (- s))

para.p:
Let
≥
U , V
2
,
≤
⁢ U V
N
, and write

Math.text: formulae@(F _ U * s = (sum _ (j less= U))@(Lambda * j * j ^ (- s)), G _ V * s = (sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * k ^ (- s)))
- (zeta ^ prime * s) / (zeta * s) = (F _ U * s - zeta * s * F _ U * s * G _ V * s - zeta ^ prime * s * G _ V * s) + (- (zeta ^ prime * s) / (zeta * s) - F _ U * s) * (1 - zeta * s * G _ V * s)

para.p: First, 4 footnote 4 4 footnote 4 Harold Davenport, Multiplicative Number Theory, third ed., p. 138, Chapter 24.

Math.text: F _ U * s = ((sum _ (n = 1)) ^ infinity)@(a _ 1 * n * n ^ (- s))
a _ 1 * n = cases@(Lambda * n, n less= U, a _ 1 * n = 0, n > U)
- zeta * s * F _ U * s * G _ V * s = ((sum _ (n = 1)) ^ infinity)@(a _ 2 * n * n ^ (- s))

Math.tex: a_{2}(n)=-\sum_{mjk=n,m\geq 1,j\leq U,k\leq V}1\cdot\Lambda(j)\cdot\mu(k)=-% \sum_{d\mid n}\sum_{djk=n,j\leq U,k\leq V}\Lambda(j)\mu(k).
Math.text: a _ 2 * n = - (sum _ (formulae@(m * j * k = n, formulae@(m >= 1, formulae@(j less= U, k less= V)))))@((((1 cdot Lambda) * j) cdot mu) * k) = - (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@((sum _ (formulae@(d * j * k = n, formulae@(j less= U, k less= V))))@(Lambda * j * mu * k))
- zeta ^ prime * s * G _ V * s = ((sum _ (n = 1)) ^ infinity)@(a _ 3 * n * n ^ (- s))

a _ 3 * n = (sum _ (formulae@(m * k = n, formulae@(m >= 1, k less= V))))@((logarithm@(m) cdot mu) * k) = (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@(logarithm@(d) * (sum _ (formulae@(d * k = n, k less= V)))@(mu * k))
- (zeta ^ prime * s) / (zeta * s) - F _ U * s = (sum _ (m > U))@(Lambda * m * m ^ (- s))

zeta * s * G _ V * s = ((sum _ (n = 1)) ^ infinity)@((sum _ (formulae@(m * k = n, formulae@(m >= 1, k less= V))))@((1 cdot mu) * k) * n ^ (- s)) = ((sum _ (n = 1)) ^ infinity)@((sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(n, d)) less= V))@(mu * d) * n ^ (- s))
1 - zeta * s * G _ V * s = - ((sum _ (h = 2)) ^ infinity)@((sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(h, d)) less= V))@(mu * d) * h ^ (- s))
(- (zeta ^ prime * s) / (zeta * s) - F _ U * s) * (1 - zeta * s * G _ V * s) = ((sum _ (n = 1)) ^ infinity)@(a _ 4 * n * n ^ (- s))
a _ 4 * n = - (sum _ (formulae@(m * h = n, formulae@(m > U, h > 1))))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(h, d)) less= V))@(mu * d))
Lambda * n = a _ 1 * n + a _ 2 * n + a _ 3 * n + a _ 4 * n

para.p:
Let
f
be an arithmetical function with
≤
| f |
1
and write

Math.text: S _ i = (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * a _ i * n)
(sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * Lambda * n) = S _ 1 + S _ 2 + S _ 3 + S _ 4
S _ 1 = (sum _ (n less= U))@(f * n * Lambda * n)
absent = (sum _ (n less= U))@(f * n * Lambda * n)
S _ 2 = - (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@((sum _ (formulae@(d * j * k = n, formulae@(j less= U, k less= V))))@(Lambda * j * mu * k)))
absent = - (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@((sum _ (formulae@(d * j * k = n, formulae@(j less= U, k less= V))))@(Lambda * j * mu * k)))
S _ 3 = (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@(logarithm@(d) * (sum _ (formulae@(d * k = n, k less= V)))@(mu * k)))
absent = (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@(logarithm@(d) * (sum _ (formulae@(d * k = n, k less= V)))@(mu * k)))
S _ 4 = - (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (formulae@(m * h = n, formulae@(m > U, h > 1))))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(h, d)) less= V))@(mu * d)))
absent = - (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (formulae@(m * h = n, formulae@(m > U, h > 1))))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(h, d)) less= V))@(mu * d)))
absolute-value@(S _ 1) = O * U
absolute-value@(S _ 1) less= (sum _ (n less= U))@(Lambda * n) = psi * U = O * U
absolute-value@(S _ 2) less= logarithm@(U * V) cdot (sum _ (h less= U * V))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (r less= N / h))@(f * r * h)))
S _ 2 = - (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@((sum _ (formulae@(d * j * k = n, formulae@(j less= U, k less= V))))@(Lambda * j * mu * k)))
absent = - (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@((sum _ (formulae@(d * j * k = n, formulae@(j less= U, k less= V))))@(Lambda * j * mu * k)))
absent = - (sum _ (h less= U * V))@((sum _ (formulae@(j * k = h, formulae@(j less= U, k less= V))))@(Lambda * j * mu * k) * (sum _ (r less= N / h))@(f * r * h))
absent = - (sum _ (h less= U * V))@((sum _ (formulae@(j * k = h, formulae@(j less= U, k less= V))))@(Lambda * j * mu * k) * (sum _ (r less= N / h))@(f * r * h))

para.p:
For
≤ h
⁢ U V
,
∑
∣ j h
⁢ Λ
( j )
=
log h
≤
log
⁢ U V
, so

Math.text: absolute-value@(S _ 2) less= logarithm@(U * V) cdot (sum _ (h less= U * V))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (r less= N / h))@(f * r * h)))

Math.tex: |S_{3}|\leq\log N\cdot\sum_{k\leq V}\max_{1\leq w\leq N/k}\left|\sum_{w\leq h% \leq N/k}f(kh)\right|.
Math.text: absolute-value@(S _ 3) less= logarithm@(N) cdot (sum _ (k less= V))@((maximum _ (1 less= w less= N / k))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (w less= h less= N / k))@(f * k * h))))
S _ 3 = (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@(logarithm@(d) * (sum _ (formulae@(d * k = n, k less= V)))@(mu * k)))
absent = (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (conditional@(d, n)))@(logarithm@(d) * (sum _ (formulae@(d * k = n, k less= V)))@(mu * k)))
absent = (sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * (sum _ (h less= N / k))@(f * k * h * logarithm@(h)))
absent = (sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * (sum _ (h less= N / k))@(f * k * h * logarithm@(h)))
absent = (sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * (sum _ (h less= N / k))@(f * k * h * ((integral _ 1) ^ h)@((d * w) / w)))
absent = (sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * (sum _ (h less= N / k))@(f * k * h * ((integral _ 1) ^ h)@((d * w) / w)))
absent = (sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * ((integral _ 1) ^ (N / k))@((sum _ (w less= h less= N / k))@(f * k * h * ((d * w) / w))))
absent = (sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * ((integral _ 1) ^ (N / k))@((sum _ (w less= h less= N / k))@(f * k * h * ((d * w) / w))))
absent = ((integral _ 1) ^ N)@((sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * (sum _ (w less= h less= N / k))@(f * k * h * ((d * w) / w))))
absent = ((integral _ 1) ^ N)@((sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * (sum _ (w less= h less= N / k))@(f * k * h * ((d * w) / w))))
absolute-value@(S _ 3) less= (maximum _ (1 less= w less= N))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * (sum _ (w less= h less= N / k))@(f * k * h)))) cdot ((integral _ 1) ^ N)@((d * w) / w)
absolute-value@(S _ 3)
absent less= (maximum _ (1 less= w less= N))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (k less= V))@(mu * k * (sum _ (w less= h less= N / k))@(f * k * h)))) cdot ((integral _ 1) ^ N)@((d * w) / w)

Math.tex: \displaystyle\leq\log N\cdot\sum_{k\leq V}\max_{1\leq w\leq N/k}\left|\sum_{w% \leq h\leq N/k}f(kh)\right|.
Math.text: absent less= logarithm@(N) cdot (sum _ (k less= V))@((maximum _ (1 less= w less= N / k))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (w less= h less= N / k))@(f * k * h))))

Math.tex: \displaystyle\leq\log N\cdot\sum_{k\leq V}\max_{1\leq w\leq N/k}\left|\sum_{w% \leq h\leq N/k}f(kh)\right|.
Math.text: absent less= logarithm@(N) cdot (sum _ (k less= V))@((maximum _ (1 less= w less= N / k))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (w less= h less= N / k))@(f * k * h))))
absolute-value@(S _ 4) lessless N ^ (1 / 2) * (logarithm@(N)) ^ 3 * (maximum _ (U less= M less= N / V))@(Delta)

para.p:
For
∈
b m
,
c k
C
, using the Cauchy-Schwarz inequality,

Math.text: absolute-value@((sum _ (M less m less= 2 * M))@(b _ m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(c _ k * f * m * k))) less= ((sum _ (M less= m less= 2 * M))@((absolute-value@(b _ m)) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2) * ((sum _ (M less= m less= 2 * M))@((absolute-value@((sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(c _ k * f * m * k))) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2)

Math.tex: \begin{split}&\displaystyle\sum_{M\leq m\leq 2M}\left|\sum_{V<k\leq N/m}c_{k}f% (mk)\right|^{2}\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\sum_{M\leq m\leq 2M}\left(\sum_{V<j\leq N/m}c_{j}% f(mj)\right)\left(\sum_{V<k\leq N/m}\overline{c_{k}f(mk)}\right)\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\sum_{V<j\leq N/M}\sum_{V<k\leq N/M}c_{j}\overline% {c_{k}}\sum_{M\leq m\leq 2M,m\leq N/j,m\leq N/k}f(mj)\overline{f(mk)},\end{split}
Math.text: (sum _ (M less= m less= 2 * M))@((absolute-value@((sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(c _ k * f * m * k))) ^ 2) = (sum _ (M less= m less= 2 * M))@((sum _ (V less j less= N / m))@(c _ j * f * m * j) * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(overline@(c _ k * f * m * k))) = (sum _ (V less j less= N / M))@((sum _ (V less k less= N / M))@(c _ j * overline@(c _ k) * (sum _ (formulae@(M less= m less= 2 * M, formulae@(m less= N / j, m less= N / k))))@(f * m * j * overline@(f * m * k))))

para.p:
so, using
≤
|
⁢
c j
c k
|
+
⁢
1 2
|
c j
|
2
⁢
1 2
|
c k
|
2
,

Math.tex: \begin{split}&\displaystyle\sum_{M\leq m\leq 2M}\left|\sum_{V<k\leq N/m}c_{k}f% (mk)\right|^{2}\\ \displaystyle\leq&\displaystyle\sum_{V<j\leq N/M}\sum_{V<k\leq N/M}\left(\frac% {1}{2}|c_{j}|^{2}+\frac{1}{2}|c_{k}|^{2}\right)\left|\sum_{M\leq m\leq 2M,m% \leq N/j,m\leq N/k}f(mj)\overline{f(mk)}\right|\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\sum_{V<j\leq N/M}|c_{j}|^{2}\sum_{V<k\leq N/M}% \left|\sum_{M\leq m\leq 2M,m\leq N/j,m\leq N/k}f(mj)\overline{f(mk)}\right|\\ \displaystyle\leq&\displaystyle\left(\sum_{V<j\leq N/M}|c_{j}|^{2}\right)\max_% {V<j\leq N/M}\sum_{V<k\leq N/M}\left|\sum_{M\leq m\leq 2M,m\leq N/j,m\leq N/k}% f(mj)\overline{f(mk)}\right|.\end{split}
Math.text: (sum _ (M less= m less= 2 * M))@((absolute-value@((sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(c _ k * f * m * k))) ^ 2) less= (sum _ (V less j less= N / M))@((sum _ (V less k less= N / M))@(((1 / 2) * (absolute-value@(c _ j)) ^ 2 + (1 / 2) * (absolute-value@(c _ k)) ^ 2) * absolute-value@((sum _ (formulae@(M less= m less= 2 * M, formulae@(m less= N / j, m less= N / k))))@(f * m * j * overline@(f * m * k))))) = (sum _ (V less j less= N / M))@((absolute-value@(c _ j)) ^ 2 * (sum _ (V less k less= N / M))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (formulae@(M less= m less= 2 * M, formulae@(m less= N / j, m less= N / k))))@(f * m * j * overline@(f * m * k))))) less= (sum _ (V less j less= N / M))@((absolute-value@(c _ j)) ^ 2) * maximum _ (V less j less= N / M) * (sum _ (V less k less= N / M))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (formulae@(M less= m less= 2 * M, formulae@(m less= N / j, m less= N / k))))@(f * m * j * overline@(f * m * k))))

absolute-value@((sum _ (M less m less= 2 * M))@(b _ m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(c _ k * f * m * k))) less= Delta * ((sum _ (M less= m less= 2 * M))@((absolute-value@(b _ m)) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2) * ((sum _ (j less= N / M))@((absolute-value@(c _ j)) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2)

Delta = (maximum _ (V less j less= N / M) * (sum _ (V less k less= N / M))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (formulae@(M less= m less= 2 * M, formulae@(m less= N / j, m less= N / k))))@(f * m * j * overline@(f * m * k))))) ^ (1 / 2)

Because

for

V

. Thus

Math.text: S _ 4 = - (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (formulae@(m * h = n, formulae@(m > U, h > 1))))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(h, d)) less= V))@(mu * d)))
absent = - (sum _ (n less= N))@(f * n * (sum _ (formulae@(m * h = n, formulae@(m > U, h > 1))))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(h, d)) less= V))@(mu * d)))
absent = - (sum _ (U less m less N / V))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(f * m * k * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(k, d)) less= V))@(mu * d)))
absent = - (sum _ (U less m less N / V))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(f * m * k * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(k, d)) less= V))@(mu * d)))
absent = - (sum _ (U less m less= N / V))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(f * m * k * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(k, d)) less= V))@(mu * d)))
absent = - (sum _ (U less m less= N / V))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(f * m * k * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(k, d)) less= V))@(mu * d)))

absent = - (sum _ (formulae@(M element-of set@(U, 2 * U, 4 * U, ldots), M less N / V)))@((sum _ (M less m less= minimum@(N / V, 2 * M)))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(f * m * k * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(k, d)) less= V))@(mu * d))))

absent = - (sum _ (formulae@(M element-of set@(U, 2 * U, 4 * U, ldots), M less N / V)))@((sum _ (M less m less= minimum@(N / V, 2 * M)))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(f * m * k * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(k, d)) less= V))@(mu * d))))

absolute-value@(S _ 4) less= (logarithm _ 2)@(N / (U * V)) * (maximum _ (U less= M less= N / V))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (M less m less= minimum@(N / V, 2 * M)))@(Lambda * m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(f * m * k * (sum _ (conditional@(d, list@(k, d)) less= V))@(mu * d)))))

Math.text: absolute-value@(S _ 4) lessless logarithm@(N) * (maximum _ (U less= M less= N / V))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (M less m less= 2 * M))@(b _ m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(c _ k * f * m * k))))
absolute-value@(S _ 4)
absent lessless logarithm@(N) * (maximum _ (U less= M less= N / V))@(absolute-value@((sum _ (M less m less= 2 * M))@(b _ m * (sum _ (V less k less= N / m))@(c _ k * f * m * k))))

absent lessless logarithm@(N) * (maximum _ (U less= M less= N / V))@(Delta) * ((sum _ (M less= m less= 2 * M))@((absolute-value@(b _ m)) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2) * ((sum _ (j less= N / M))@((absolute-value@(c _ j)) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2)

absent lessless logarithm@(N) * (maximum _ (U less= M less= N / V))@(Delta) * ((sum _ (M less= m less= 2 * M))@((absolute-value@(b _ m)) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2) * ((sum _ (j less= N / M))@((absolute-value@(c _ j)) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2)
absent lessless logarithm@(N) * (maximum _ (U less= M less= N / V))@(Delta) * ((sum _ (M less= m less= 2 * M))@(Lambda * m ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2) * ((sum _ (j less= N / M))@(d * k ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2)
absent lessless logarithm@(N) * (maximum _ (U less= M less= N / V))@(Delta) * ((sum _ (M less= m less= 2 * M))@(Lambda * m ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2) * ((sum _ (j less= N / M))@(d * k ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2)
(sum _ (m less= y))@(Lambda * m ^ 2) less= logarithm@(y) * (sum _ (m less= y))@(Lambda * m) = O * y * logarithm@(y)

para.p:
On the other hand, let
h
be the multiplicative arithmetic function such that for prime
p
and for nonnegative integer
a
,
=
⁢ h
(
p a
)
+
⁢ 2 a
1
. The divisor function satisfies
=
⁢ d
(
p a
)
+ a 1
, and

Math.text: (sum _ (conditional@(d, p ^ a)))@(h * d) = (sum _ (0 less= b less= a))@(h * p ^ b)
(sum _ (conditional@(d, p ^ a)))@(h * d)
absent = (sum _ (0 less= b less= a))@(h * p ^ b)
absent = (sum _ (0 less= b less= a))@(2 * b + 1)
absent = (sum _ (0 less= b less= a))@(2 * b + 1)

para.p: Merten’s theorem 5 footnote 5 5 footnote 5 G. H. Hardy and E. M. Wright, An Introduction to the Theory of Numbers, fifth ed., p. 351, Theorem 429. tells us

Math.text: (product _ (p less= y))@(1 - 1 / p) similar-to e ^ (- gamma) / logarithm@(y)

para.p:
where
γ
is Euler’s constant, and using this,

Math.text: (sum _ (k less= y))@(d * k ^ 2) = O * y * (logarithm@(y)) ^ 3
